definition: surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet

sentences.english: Our company is located in songjiang district of Shanghai beautiful satellite.
sentences.chinese: 我公司位於上海美麗的衛星城松江。

sentences.english: Many visitors wil choose to stay in the suburbs, satellite towns and neighboring cities.
sentences.chinese: 許多參觀者會選擇住在郊區，衛星城，和臨近城市。

sentences.english: The solution of this problem is to establish industrial satellite towns in the outer-suburb.
sentences.chinese: 解決的辦法是在遠郊區建設工業衛星城鎮。

sentences.english: Our company is located in the beautiful Shanghai Songjiang satellite.
sentences.chinese: 我公司位於上海美麗的衛星城松江。

sentences.english: Privet Drive is on the outskirts of what I would call a " satellite" town to London.
sentences.chinese: 女貞路是在我把它稱之爲倫敦的“衛星城”的邊緣。

sentences.english: The satellite cities and the 33 major towns will also be afforested.
sentences.chinese: 完善郊區衛星城和33箇中心鎮綠化體系。

definition: Changjiang 長江|长江 or Yangtze River/old name for Changjiang, especially lower reaches around Yangzhou 揚州|扬州
Tokyo Bay/former name of 北部灣|北部湾[Bei3 bu4 Wan1], Gulf of Tonkin
see 三農問題|三农问题[san1 nong2 wen4 ti2]
to stay/to remain/to linger/(computing) to reside/resident (program etc)
